title: Georgia eyes onchain property rights and tokenization with Hedera partnership
description: Georgia is considering migrating its national registry to Hedera and introducing onchain real-estate tokenization as part of a wider blockchain overhaul of public services.
content: Georgias Ministry of Justice has signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with the public blockchain network Hedera, as it considers moving the countrys land registry onchain and tokenizing real es… [+2649 chars]
